data.name: The Power Latch Kid

▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀

Play as the Power Latch Kid in this classic arcade style twin-stick shump! Enjoy the complex gameplay experience of physics melding with shooting anarchy! How long can you stand to dwell within the crushing madness of the Amalgotron before you succumb to its mighty insanity? Play for highscores, honor, and for your own personal reasons! Or don't! I'm a game description, not a cop.


- Use your Power Latch abilities to control the physics within! Marvelous!
- Over 10 types of enemies! Amazing!
- No two games play the same! You could say the same about cards but we're saying it here! Stupendous!
- Will this game bring about world peace?!?! No! But maybe!? Outrageous!

data.short_description: Play as the Power Latch Kid in this classic arcade style twin-stick shump! Enjoy the complex gameplay experience of physics melding with shooting anarchy! How long can you stand to dwell within the crushing madness of the Amalgotron before you succumb to its mighty insanity?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit, Windows 8.1 64 Bit, Windows 8 64 Bit, Windows 7 64 Bit Service Pack 1
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad CPU Q6600 @ 2.40GHz (4 CPUs) / AMD Phenom 9850 Quad-Core Processor (4 CPUs) @ 2.5GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 9800 GT 1GB / AMD HD 4870 1GB (DX 10, 10.1, 11)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space MB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX 10 compatible

data.legal_notice: Copyright 2021 Lazy Brain Games. Do not pirate on any other site. Unless you are in a country that we're not selling this game. In which case, please still charge money and put it towards that 2001 Jetta you've been eyeing on Craigslist. You deserve it.
